data.name: AccidentHouse
data.detailed_description:
QuietMansion1 Demo Download Now!!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1670400


About the Game

"Escape from a dark abandoned house"

This is what the game’s all about.
Dark abandoned houses, laboratory passages where someone (or something) lurks, etc.
Various locations will appear in AccidentHouse. Can you withstand the horror?
Completely personal development
I am an individual game developer and I am passionate about developing games enjoyed around the world that are created by students like me.

This game welcomes all reviewers and streamers!

There is a playtime of around 30 minutes to 1 hour, or 2 hours if you interact with the replay element, which is recommended for most players.
We are awaiting your video content!

More about how this “Evolving” horror game came to be:

I had the experience of developing for home video game consoles, which is a rare opportunity for individual game developers. “AccidentHouse” was developed by making full use of that experience


Translator: (Steam User Name)Dust

data.short_description: 【This is the fear of someone trapped in a dark, abandoned house.】 This is the latest entry in the QuietMansion (formerly known as KENGOHAZARD) series. This evolving short horror game, which was developed by a 19 year old Japanese student, is coming to Steam!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3/AMD Ryzen™
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can also play on laptop
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5/AMD Ryzen™
  • Memory: 3000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can feel more realistic by using earphones or headphones

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
